body.subject: View your Teams Phone Mobile invoice

action.text: Workflow Assign new tickets to jwowk was triggered for conversation #42

threads.body:
Sign in to the Microsoft 365 admin center to view your invoice.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             

Sign in to view your Teams Phone Mobile invoice

Your Teams Phone Mobile invoice is now available in the Microsoft 365 admin center. Sign in to view it.
View your invoice >

If you’ve already paid, disregard this email.

If you’re set up to pay by credit card, no action is required—we’ll charge your card within 24 hours of the invoice date.

To review changes made to this subscription, go to the subscription history in the Microsoft 365 admin center.

Additional resources

  • Learn more about your invoice
  • Learn how to navigate your invoices
  • Change the way you receive invoices
  • Change your payment method
  • Change your billing address

Account information

Organization name: High Purity New England

Domain: hp-ne.com

Subscription name: Teams Phone Mobile

Subscription expiration date: July 1, 2023

View or update your billing notification preferences.

Privacy Statement

Microsoft Corporation, One Microsoft Way, ​Redmond, WA 98052​
